application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 4 (basement impact assessment) and 5 (sustainable water management scheme) of planning permission reference  9043/APP/2022/2490, dated 12-05-2023, for the 'Demolition of existing buildings and replacement with up to 2.5 storey extension to main building to provide 4 self-contained flats and redevelopment of existing coach house building to provide 1 maisonette unit with associated parking, cycle and bin storage, and landscape works.'
decision_conditions: The Applicant has failed to provide a monitoring method to ensure the risk of water movement, subsidence, and changes to local ground conditions are adequately monitored and managed. The application, therefore, fails to demonstrate the development would not impact the structural stability of neighbouring buildings and immediate areas in compliance with Policies DMHB 11, DMHD 3, and DMEI 9 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).

The Applicant has failed to demonstrate a water efficiency of 105 litres per person per day would be achieved by the development. The application, therefore, fails to comply with Policy DMEI 10 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).
